Boundary Level: base of the beige marl bed of small-scale carbonate cycle 77 (MPRS 347)
Correlation Events: Magnetic - Gauss/Gilbert (C2An/C2Ar) magnetic reversal is recorded immediately above the GSSP

Boundary Level: base of the Trubi Formation which corresponds to Insolation cycle 510
Correlation Events: Magnetic - base of the Thvera magnetic event (C3n.4n) is only 96 kyr (5 precession cycles) younger than the GSSP.

Boundary Level: reddish layer of sedimentary cycle number 15
Correlation Events: Planktonic foraminifer first regular occurrence of Globorotalia miotumida, and calcareous nannofossil FAD Amaurolithus delicatus

GSSP Location: Monte dei Corvi Beach, near Ancona, Italy
Boundary Level: mid-point of sapropel layer of basic cycle number 76.
Correlation Events: Calcareous nannofossil last common occurrence of Discoaster kugleri

GSSP Location: Ras il Pellegrin section, Fomm Ir- Rih Bay, west coast of Malta
Boundary Level: formation boundary between the Globigerina Limestone and Blue Clay
Correlation Events: Oxygen-isotopic event (global cooling episode) Mi3b; near calcareous nannofossil LAD of Sphenolithus heteromorphus

GSSP Location: Potentially in astronomicallytuned ODP core (Leg 154) or in Italy (Moria or La Vedova )
Correlation Events: Near planktonic foraminifer FAD of Praeorbulina glomerosa and top of magnetic polarity chronozone C5Cn.1n
Near planktonic foraminifer FAD of Globigerinoides altiaperturus or near top of magnetic polarity chronozone C6An

Boundary Level: 35m from the top of the section
Correlation Events: Magnetic - base of Chron C6Cn.2n; planktonic foraminifer FAD of Paragloborotalia kugleri; calcareous nannofossil near LAD Reticulofenestra bisecta (base Zone NN1); Oxygen isotopic event Mi-1.
